reporting-org.narrative: MAMTA HEALTH INSTITUTE FOR MOTHER and CHILD

title.narrative: Improving maternal and child health services and livelihood opportunities for 37,280 poor women in two Districts of Uttar Pradesh, India

description.narrative: The project aims at improving maternal and child health outcomes of marginalised sections of population while contributing to poverty reduction at individual and household level. This will be achieved by strengthening community processes, institutions and health systems in facilitating women from marginalised sections for their improved access and inclusion in health and livelihood opportunities.

organisation.narrative: MAMTA HEALTH INSTITUTE FOR MOTHER & CHILD

description.narrative: The project is implemented in two districts of one state (Utter Pradesh)
Grants for implementation of project mamta_himc-gpaf046 (Improving maternal and child health services and livelihood opportunities for 37,280 poor women in two Districts of Uttar Pradesh, India)

receiver-org.narrative: MAMTA HEALTH INSTITUTE FOR MOTHER & CHILD
